document.heading: Resolution of the Kiowa Tribe Legislature Authorizing the Bureau of Indian Affairs Anadarko Agency and the Chairman of the Tribe to Safeguard, Proceed, and Execute Leases for the Kiowa Tribe 100% Owned Farming and Grazing Leases and Oil and Gas Leases, and Right-of-Way Encumbrances, that are under the Authority of the Kiowa Tribe Executive Branch
